metadata.title: CVE-2018-20179 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Integer Underflowthat leads to a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in the function lspci_process()and results in memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
